channel.title: R on A Hugo website

item.title: Obtaining Spatial Data from Esri REST APIs
item.description: There is a massive amount of spatial data available through Esri REST APIs. It is a popular publishing format for federal, state, and county governments meaning that many of these data fall within the public domain. At the time of writing this there are 7266 datasets published on data.gov available through Esri REST APIs. Many of these data are also available for download via other formats such as Geodatabase, shape, and zipped files.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
